about_the_game:
Hunter or hunted? Make sure it’s the former with the Safari-Sadist DLC pack, featuring three trapper-themed weapon skins, usable across all in-game weapons. It’s ideal for snipers who want to blend in before they strike.

Features:
  • Scorched Tree (weapon skin)
  • Huntsman (weapon skin)
  • Worn Wood (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
